articles.author: Chandelis Duster
articles.title: Museums to close exhibits featuring Native American artifacts, as new federal regulations take effect - CNN
articles.description: Museums across the nation will begin closing exhibits featuring cultural artifacts from Native American tribes in the coming weeks, in response to new regulations from the Biden administration.
articles.content:
Museums across the United States will begin closing or adapting exhibits featuring cultural artifacts from Native American tribes, in response to new regulations from the Biden administration.
